verses.1: Tua khit ciangin Galilee gam sungah Jesu zin kawikawi hi. Jerusalem khua-a om Jew mi uliante in amah that nuam uh ahih manin Judea gam sungah zin nuam nawn lo hi.
verses.2: Jew miteʼ Buk Pawi hun hong nai ta ahih manin,
verses.3: ama sanggamte in Jesu kiangah, “Na nung hong zui mihonte in na nasepna a muh theih nadingun hih lai panin pai khia-in Judea gamah va pai in.
verses.4: Miteʼ theih ding a ut pa in a simthamin na sem ngei lo hi. Hih bangin na semsem na hih manin na sepna thu mi khempeuh theisak vet in,” ci-in zahpihna tawh thu gen uh a,
verses.5: ama sanggamte mahmah in zong Jesu um lo uh hi.
verses.6: Ahi zongin Jesu in, “Kei adingin pai ding a hunhoih hi nai lo hi; ahi zongin note adingin a hunhoih hi tawntung hi.
verses.7: Leitung miteʼ gamtatnate hoih lo hi, ci-in gen tawntung ka hih manin amaute in kei hong mudah uh hi; ahi zongin note hong mudah lo uh hi.
verses.8: Tua ahih manin pawi siim dingin note va pai un. Kei adingin a hunhoih hi nai lo ahih manin kei ka hong pai kei ding hi,” ci-in dawng a,
verses.9: amah pai loin Galilee gam sung mahah a om lai hi.
verses.10: Ahi zongin a sanggamte a dinkhiat khit ciangin Jesu zong Jerusalem ah Buk Pawi siim dingin a nung pai hi. Ahi zongin a kilang lua-in pai loin a sim pai ahi hi.
verses.11: Jerusalem-a om Jew mi uliante in tua pawi lak khawng Jesu zong uh a, “Koi ah om ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.12: Ama thu hangin mihonte lakah kam kihona tampi om a, “Amah mihoih mahmah khat hi,” ci uh a, pawl khat in, “Mi khemin a lam khialhpih ding pa ahih manin mihoih hi het lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.13: Ahi zongin Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante a kihtakna hangun kuamah in Jesu thu a kilangin gen ngam lo uh hi.
verses.14: Pawi kham hunsung alang bang a bei khit ciangin biakinn sungah Jesu lutin thuhilh ding a kipan hi.
verses.15: Jew mi uliante in lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Hih mipa cikmah a sang kah ngei lo kimlai bang hangin thu hih zah thei ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.16: Tua ahih manin Jesu in, “Ka thugente pen keima thu hi lo a, kei a hong sawl Pasian kiang panin a hong pai thu ahi hi.
verses.17: Pasianʼ deihna bangin a gamta nuam mi peuhmah in, ka thugente pen Pasianʼ kiang panin a hong pai thu a gen ka hihna leh keima thu bek tawh a gen ka hihna khen thei ding uh hi.
verses.18: Amauʼ thu bek tawh thu a gente in amauʼ minthan nading a zong hi a, ahi zongin a hong sawl paʼ minthan nading a zong keimah in thuman thutak gen ka hih manin zuau thu kihel lo hi.
verses.19: Moses in note tungah Thukham hong pia napi-in kuamah in na zui kei uh hi. Tua hi napi, bang hangin thah dingin kei hong sawm na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.20: Tua ciangin mihonte in, “Dawivei hi teh! Kua in nang thah hong sawm ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.21: Jesu in, “Sabbath ni-in cina damsakna nalamdang khat ka bawlna hangin lamdang na sa mahmah uh hi.
verses.22: Moses in na tapate uh vun na at ding uh thu hong pia a, (a taktakin Moses thupiak ma pekin na pu na pate un a palsat thu ahi hi) vun at ni ding le Sabbath ni a kituah khak ciangin a vun na at veve uh hi.
verses.23: Moses thupiakna a kipelh loh nadingin Sabbath ni-in vun at na hih uh leh Sabbath ni-in mi khat ka damsak manin bang hangin kei tungah heh na hi uh hiam?
verses.24: A tungtham a kimu nate siksanin thu khen kei unla, thu taktak siksanin thu khen zaw un,” a ci hi.
verses.25: Jerusalem khuami pawl khat in, “Thah dingin a sawm pa uh hih pa hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.26: Tua hi napi, mihon lakah thu gengen napi-in kuamah in bangmah cih lo uh hi. Uliante in Khris hi, ci-in theihtelna nei uh hi ding hiam?
verses.27: Tua ding lah, hih mipa hong pian khiatna i theih hi a, Khris hong pai ciangin ama pian khiatna kuamah in a theih ding hi lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.28: Tua ahih manin biakinn sungah a gen mah bangin mi khempeuh zakin gen khia a, “Kei hong thei tel taktak a, ka hong pian khiatna mun a thei takpi mah na hi uh hiam? Keima thu tawh a hong pai tawm ka hi kei hi; kei a hong sawl a thuman pa a thei lo na hi uh hi.
verses.29: Ahi zongin amah in kei hong sawlin, ama kiang panin a hong pai ka hih manin keʼn ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
verses.30: Tua ciangin amaute in Jesu mat ding hanciam uh hi; ahi zongin ama hun tung nai lo ahih manin kuamah in va su lo hi.
verses.31: Ahi zongin mihon lak panin mi tampi mah in amah um uh a, “Khris hong pai ciangin hih mipa sangin nalamdang tam zaw hong bawl tuan ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.32: Hih bangin mihonpite a kihona thu Farisi mite in za uh ahih manin amaute le siampi liante in Jesu a man dingin biakinn cing palikte pawl khat a sawl uh hi.
verses.33: Jesu in tua mite kiangah, “Note lakah tawl khat ka om lai dinga, tua ciangin kei hong sawl pa kiangah ka pai ding hi.
verses.34: Keima omna munah note hong pai thei lo ding na hih manun tua hun ciangin kei nong zon uh hangin nong mu kei ding uh hi,” a na ci hi.

verses.36: ‘Kei nong zon uh hangin nong mu zo kei ding uh hi,’ a cihna leh ‘Keima omna munah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,’ a cih ciangin bang a cihnopna hi ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a kikum uh hi.
verses.37: Pawi bei ni ding pen a thupi pen ni hi a, tua ni-in mihon lakah Jesu dingin nakpi takin kiko a, “A dangtak na om uh leh ka kiangah hong pai unla tui hong dawn un.
verses.38: Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Kei hong um mite sung panin nuntakna tui luang khia ding hi,’ a cih mah bangin kei hong um mite ka kiangah hong pai-in hong dawn ta un,” a ci hi.
verses.39: Jesu in hih bang a gen ciangin amah a umte in a ngah ding Kha Siangtho thu a genna hi a, tua hun laitakin Pasianʼ pianzia nei-in sihna panin Jesu kithokiksak nai lo ahih manin Kha Siangtho kipia khia nai lo hi.
verses.40: Hih thu a zak uh ciangin mihon pawl khat in, “Hih pa pen Kamsang pa taktak hi,” ci uh a,
verses.41: pawl khat in, “Hih pa, Khris ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahi zongin pawl khat in, “Galilee gam panin Khris hong piang ding ahi hiam?
verses.42: Khris i cih pen Davidʼ suan hi dinga, Davidʼ suahna Bethlehem khua ah suak ding hi, ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.43: Tua ahih manin Jesu thu tawh kisai ah mihonteʼ lungsim kituak lo hi.
verses.44: Mi pawl khat in Jesu man nuam uh hi; ahi zongin kuamah in su ngam lo hi.
verses.45: Tua ciangin siampi liante le Farisi mite kiangah palikte a va ciahkik uh ciangin, “Bang hangin amah hong kai lo na hi uh hiam” a na ci uh hi.
verses.46: Palikte in, “Hih mipaʼ thugen bangin a gen kuamah om nai lo hi,” a cih uh ciangin
verses.47: Farisi mite in, “Note zong hong khem khinzo ta ahi hiam?
verses.48: Jew mi uliante hitaleh Farisi mite hitaleh sung panin amah a um, na theih uh om nai ahi hiam?
verses.49: Hih mihonte in ahihleh Moses Thukham thei lo uh ahih manin Pasianʼ samsiatna a thuak dingte hi lel uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.50: Tua hun ma-in Jesu kiangah a va hawh sim ngei Nikodemas zong uliante sungah kihel ahih manin
verses.51: amah in, “Mi khat peuhmah a thu dongin ama gamtatnate i theih masak mateng mawhsakna thu i khen ding pen i Thukham tawh kituak lo hi,” a ci hi.
